Key West, Florida

This location is well known for its subtropical climate and beautiful clear waters. Located near the Gulf of Mexico. What makes this location unique is the steady temperatures year round as they remain nearly the same. A great destination spot also, many tourists come here for the ocean experience, natural reefs, food, culture, fishing, and watersports. Many people mark this one on the list as a must vist!
